controlled_vocabulary.comment: This table provides the restricted vocabulary for the column cell_structure in the table Species and provides a way to quickly separate categories relevant to single and multicellular species and eukaryotic or prokaryotic or viral species.

term.name: unicellular_eubacteria
term.description: organisms that are single celled and eubacteria

term.name: unicellular_archaebacteria
term.description: organisms that are single-celled and archaebacteria

term.name: unicellular_eukaryotic
term.description: organisms that are single celled and nucleated

term.name: rna_virus
term.description: viruses whose nucleic acid is composed of RNA

term.name: dna_virus
term.description: viruses whose nucleic acid is composed of DNA

term.name: prion
term.description: organisms not known to have a nucleic acid component

term.name: multicellular_eukaryotic
term.description: organisms with nuclei and a multicellular structure unknown from a mixed or uncharacterized source
